author: Bill Bradley
title: Chris Evans Proves He's Really Captain America, Takes On Former KKK Leader
text:
Chris Evans Proves He's Really Captain America, Takes On Former KKK Leader He can do this all day. 02/10/2017 09:31 am ET Bill Bradley Entertainment Editor, The Huffington Post Marvel Put up your (David) dukes. 
Chris Evans takes his Captain America duties very seriously. 
In fact, as noted by HuffPost and other outlets , his responsibilities are apparently extending beyond the Marvel Cinematic Universe and into real life via his Twitter account. 
Now the Cap is at it again, taking on former Ku Klux Klan leader David Duke. Evans couldn’t remain silent after Duke gave his support for Attorney General Jeff Sessions ’ confirmation. 
The actor tweeted, “If David Duke....DAVID!...DUKE!... thinks you’re right, then you are unequivocally wrong.” If David Duke....DAVID!...DUKE!... thinks you're right, then you are unequivocally wrong. The confirmation of @jeffsessions is beyond words. https://t.co/CuLUznwO6S — Chris Evans (@ChrisEvans) February 9, 2017 
Like villains would do in Marvel movies, Duke fired back, calling Evans a “typical dumb actor.” Typical dumb actor - if everything I say is wrong, then when I say I oppose these Zionists wars, you must be for them, Captain America!? https://t.co/fsxQHgzdWD — David Duke (@DrDavidDuke) February 9, 2017 
Oh, but Captain America wasn’t done. Evans turned Duke’s own words against him. @DrDavidDuke well if these nuggets of bigotry are some of your OTHER thoughts, then I stand by my original tweet https://t.co/YSrOCDuyBw — Chris Evans (@ChrisEvans) February 9, 2017 
He later tweeted out, “We can’t let hatred be the loudest voice.” We can't let hatred be the loudest voice. https://t.co/bqRPRXo453 — Chris Evans (@ChrisEvans) February 9, 2017 
The Huffington Post recently asked Evans’ “Avengers” co-star Cobie Smulders if she and her castmates were the Avengers in real life. She didn’t confirm or deny the notion but said, “I think they want to do good, and they want people to be happy, and they want to speak what they believe.” 
Just keep speaking what you believe, Captain. Also on HuffPost Photographer Imagines What Superheroes Would Look Like Retired Photographer Imagines What Superheroes Would Look Like Retired 1
